Title: .NET AND SHAREPOINT METEO COMPONENTS
Description:
Different components for show meteo on a WebSite :
 - User control for .NET FrameWork 1.1 (VB.NET and C#)
 - User control for .NET FrameWork 2.0 (VB.NET and C#)
 - SharePoint 2003 WebPart (C#)
 - SharePoint 2007 WebPart (C#)

The components use the weather.com WebServices.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Different components for show meteo on a WebSite :
- User control for .NET FrameWork 1.1 (VB.NET and C#)
- User control for .NET FrameWork 2.0 (VB.NET and C#)
- SharePoint 2003 WebPart (C#)
- SharePoint 2007 WebPart (C#)

The components use the weather.com WebServices.


Introduction
After writing one article for Use a WebService in .NET :
- http://www.asp-php.net/scripts/asp.net/weathercontrol.php

I create this project for purpose all .NET components based on the same system.
We use all Data from the Weather.com Webservices, you have to register for use it in your application :
- http://registration.weather.com/registration/xmloap/step1



Other
You can find the same thing for PHP ou PHP.NET on this WebSite :
- PHP 4 : http://www.asp-php.net/scripts/asp-php/phpnet_weather.php?page=2
- PHP 5 : http://www.asp-php.net/scripts/asp-php/phpnet_weather.php?page=6
- PHP.NET : http://www.asp-php.net/scripts/asp-php/phpnet_weather.php?page=5
- ASP.NET : http://www.codeproject.com/useritems/weathercontrolVB.asp

We hope these components can help many people.

Riobé Nicolas and Romelard Fabrice (MVP)
